Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repeated code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The repeated if else statements checking the url endings and asserting the get, post, delete and patch methods can be extracted into a separate method to make the code cleaner and more maintainable.

Improvements.Improvement: Use constants for repeated string literals
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- String relatedEntityTag="relatedEntity"; 
+ private static final String RELATED_ENTITY_TAG = "relatedEntity";
Improvements.Description: The repeated string literals in the url endings and the entity tags can be defined as constants at the beginning of the method to avoid potential typing errors and to easily change the values in one place if needed.
